Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) While this card is revealed in play, the first order you play each turn gains -1 {c}.
Name: For Her, They Follow

Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) While this card is revealed in play, the first card you recruit each turn gains -1 {c}.
Name: To Her, They Come

Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) All allied cards regain +1 {l}.
Name: Flow, Her Radiant Embrace

Text: Trigger: Target reinforcement is activated by a card arriving to its fortification. Response: Target reinforcement gains the Persistence, 1 keyword. (Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.))
Name: Come to Her, Stay with Her

Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) While this card is revealed in play, the first time an opponent pays one or more cards to fulfill the {c} of another card each turn, they pay an additional card (if possible).
Name: Against Her, They Relent

Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) While this card is revealed in play, all damage dealt on an opponent's turn is prevented and attached fortifications gain "damage dealt to this fortification cannot be prevented". If this card is attached to a Defenseless fortification, destroy it.
Name: Peace Be Upon Her Land

Text: Replace this card with any faith reinforcement from your discard pile (except By Her Name, Return), then activate that reinforcement.
Name: By Her Name, Return

Text: Disciple (This card can be used to satisfy the Disciple requirement of another card's Worship effect while it shares a recruitment rail with that card.)
Name: Devoted

Text: Disciple (This card can be used to satisfy the Disciple requirement of another card's Worship effect while it shares a recruitment rail with that card.) When this unit is recruited, every card on the recruitment rail it was recruited to regains +1 {l}.
Name: Priest

Text: Disciple (This card can be used to satisfy the Disciple requirement of another card's Worship effect while it shares a recruitment rail with that card.) When this unit is deployed to a lane with a revealed Persistence card in it, it gains +2 {p} until the end of this turn.
Name: Cleric

Text: Sanctum (Allied Worship effects require 1 less Disciple to activate.) When this card would be destroyed, it instead remains in play at 0 {l} and gains the Defenseless keyword. (Defenseless (This fortification does not prevent allied cards from being targeted for attacks.))
Name: Her Hallowed Grounds

Text: Trigger: A card is deployed. Response: Target reinforcement is revealed.
Name: Her Gospel, Received

Text: Long-distance, Reload Whenever a Long-distance card skips the arrival step, you may reveal target face down reinforcement in the lane that card was deployed to. When this card is recruited, it gains 2 Ammo counters.
Name: Teyr, Treetop Watchman

Text: Until the start of your next turn, whenever a reinforcement controlled by an opponent would be revealed, instead reveal all of their face down reinforcements.
Name: Bird's Eye View

Text: Until the start of your next turn, whenever a reinforcement controlled by an opponent is revealed, that reinforcement is placed on the bottom of their deck.
Name: Misfortune, Avoided

Text: Scout (Whenever an opponent places a reinforcement that shares a field with this fortification, reveal it.) Allied fortifications that share a lane with this fortification gain the Scout keyword while it is in play.
Name: Crow's Nest

Text: Long-distance, Piercing, Reload When this card is recruited, it gains 3 Ammo counters.
Name: Sandpit Christy, Heartseeker

Text: Whenever a card with Piercing and Long-distance deploys this turn, it may activate the effect of both keywords without removing any Ammo counters.
Name: Fire for Effect

Text: Trigger: Target Piercing card skips the arrival step and deals damage to a fortification. Response: Target card may target any card controlled by an opponent for its piercing damage.
Name: Death's Judgement

Text: Defenseless (This fortification does not prevent allied cards from being targeted for attacks.) Whenever a Deadeye leader is deployed from a field shared by this fortification, it may declare attack targets as though it were deployed to any lane from an adjacent field.
Name: Predator's Loophole

Text: Long-distance (When this card is deployed, you may remove an Ammo counter from it. If you do, this card skips the arrival step.) Reload (At the end of your deployment phase, if this card was deployed, you may remove an Ammo counter from it. If you do, place it back on the recruitment rail it was deployed from.) When this card is recruited, it gains 2 Ammo counters.
Name: Bowman

Text: Piercing (When this card deals damage to a fortification, you may remove an Ammo counter from it. If you do, this card deals 1 damage to a recruited card that shares a field with the fortification.) Reload (At the end of your deployment phase, if this card was deployed, you may remove an Ammo counter from it. If you do, place it back on the recruitment rail it was deployed from.) When this card is recruited, it gains 2 Ammo counters.
Name: Arbalist

Text: Long-distance, Piercing, Reload (At the end of your deployment phase, if this card was deployed, you may remove an Ammo counter from it. If you do, place it back on the recruitment rail it was deployed from.) When this card is recruited, it gains 3 Ammo counters.
Name: Ballista Crew

Text: Whenever an allied card would deal Piercing damage to a recruited card this turn, instead you may deal that damage to a different fortification that shares a lane with the original fortification the card attacked.
Name: Ricochet

Text: The first time an allied card arrives at a fortification this turn, you may remove any number of Ammo counters from it. If you do, it gains {p} equal to the number of Ammo counters removed.
Name: Point-Blank

Text: Ammo Target ranged card gains an Ammo counter and the Long-distance keyword until the end of this turn.
Name: Flight Arrows

Text: Ammo Target ranged card gains an Ammo counter and the Piercing keyword until the end of this turn.
Name: Piercing Bolts

Text: The next time target ranged card would deal damage to a fortification this turn, that damage may instead be distributed to any number of recruited cards that share a field with the fortification.
Name: Shrapnel Shot

Text: The next time target ranged card would deal damage to a recruited card this turn, instead remove that card from its recruitment rail.
Name: Concussion Shot

Text: Deal 1 damage to any card an opponent has recruited or deployed.
Name: Pick Off

Text: Prevent all damage dealt to recruited allied cards that share a field with this reinforcement until the end of this turn.
Name: A Mile Away

Text: Reveal target card an opponent controls that shares a field with this reinforcement.
Name: Exposed Sightline

Text: Target ranged card gains an Ammo counter.
Name: Resupply Run

Text: Trigger: Allied Ammo card is played. Response: You may play an additional Ammo card without paying its {c}.
Name: Two in the Chamber

Text: Trigger: Allied fortification is attacked by target card controlled by an opponent. Response: Remove an ammo counter from a recruited allied ranged unit. If you do, deal damage equal to the unit's {p} to the target card.
Name: Watchful Sentry

Text: Trigger: Target Long-distance card arrives at a fortification and activates a reinforcement card. Response: Redeploy target Long-distance card to the same lane and skip the arrival step. (The activated reinforcement card's effect still resolves)
Name: Bound Back

Text: Ammo Target ranged card gains an Ammo counter and +1 {p} while attacking fortifications this turn.
Name: Bunker Buster Bolts

Text: Ammo Target ranged card gains an Ammo counter and the first time it deals damage to a fortification this turn, deal 1 damage to all other fortifications controlled by an opponent.
Name: Arc Arrows

Text: For each Ammo counter on cards you have recruited, deal 1 damage to a target fortification controlled by an opponent. You cannot declare deployments this turn.
Name: Firing Line

Text: Until the end of this turn, whenever an allied card would gain Long-distance or Piercing while already having the given keyword, place an Ammo counter on that card.
Name: Practice Makes Perfect

Text: The first time an attached fortification takes damage this turn, you may destroy an allied ranged unit on a recruitment rail that shares a field with the fortification. If you do, deal damage equal to your destroyed unit's {p} to all cards an opponent has recruited to that field.
Name: Return Fire

Text: Return the first card that arrives at an attached fortification to its recruitment rail and equip this card to it. While this is equipped, parent card cannot be deployed. Equip (Attach this card to another card. It remains attached until the parent card is destroyed.) Once per Turn Order (1 {d}): Destroy this card.
Name: Snare

Text: Trigger: Target card is deployed. Response: Target card skips the arrival step.
Name: Scouting Report

Text: Trigger: Target Piercing card arrives at a fortification and activates a reinforcement card. Response: Remove an Ammo counter from target card. If you do, negate the activated reinforcement card and destroy it.
Name: Push Through

Text: Trigger: An Ammo card is played. Response: You may search your deck for an Ammo card with the same name, and play it without paying its {c}.
Name: One Bird With Two Stones

Text: Any number of Long-distance cards may be deployed to the same lane until the end of this turn. Any Long-distance card deployed this turn must skip the arrival step.
Name: Rain Hell

Text: Whenever a ranged card arrives at a fortification this turn, you may discard a card. If you do, the arriving card attacks twice in the attack step until the end of this turn. (You may choose different targets for the attacks).
Name: Rapid Fire

Text: Trigger: An Ammo card is played. Response: Apply the effect of that Ammo card to all allied ranged cards.
Name: Surplus Munitions

Text: The first time a card arrives at this fortification each turn, you may destory a ranged card on an allied recruitment rail. If you do, deal 1 damage to the arriving card.
Name: Ramparts
